text: INFO: To be recited in Jannatul Baqi Cemetry Cemetry has Graves of

DESC: • Imam Hassan (as) • Imam Zainul Abideen (as) • Imam Baqer (as) • Imam Sadiq (as) • Fatima Bint Asad - mother of Imam ali (as) • Wives of Prophet (saws) • Hz Aqeel & Hz Abdullah • Hz Ibrahim (son) • Hurra martyrs • Paternal aunts • Ismail s/o Imam Sadiq (as) • Haleemah Sadiya • Ummul Baneen - mother of Hz. Abbas (as)
INFO: Permission to Enter - Izn e Dukhool
ya mawaliyya ya abna'a rasuli allahi
a'adkhulu ya mala'ikata allahi almuhdiqina bihadha alharami
INFO: After you attain reverence, submission, and tenderheartedness, you may enter the shrine with your right foot, and say the following
wa subhana allahi bukratan wa asilan
INFO: You may then move toward their tombs, face them, turn the back to the kiblah direction, and say the following
alssalamu `alaykum ayyuha alquwwamu fi albariyyati bilqisti
ashhadu annakum qad ballaghtum wa nasahtum
wa kudhdhibtum wa usi'a ilaykum faghafartum
wa ashhadu annakumu al-a'immatu alrrashiduna almuhtaduna
wa annakum da`a'imu alddini wa arkanu al-ardi
wa lam tashrak fikum fitanu al-ahwa'i
wa tayyaba khalqana bima manna `alayna min wilayatikum
wa hadha maqamu man asrafa wa akhta'a
INFO: You may then raise your head toward the sky and say the following
ya man huwa qa'imun la yashu
ma`a aqwamin khasastahum bima khasastani bihi
wa la tukhayyibni fi ma da`awtu
wa salla allahu `ala muhammadin wa ali muhammadin
DESC: You may now pray Almighty Allah for anything you want.
DESC: In Tahdhib al-Ahkam, Shaykh al-Tusi says: You may then offer the Ziyarah Prayer in eight units; each two units are for one of the (four) Imams.
INFO: Shaykh al-Tusi and Sayyid Ibn Tawus say that if you want to bid farewell to the four Imams, you may say the following
alssalamu `alaykum a'immata alhuda wa rahmatu allahi wa barakatuhu
wa bima ji'tum bihi wa dalaltum `alayhi
DESC: You may then supplicate Almighty Allah as earnestly as possible and pray Him to grant you another opportunity to visit these holy tombs.
